org.hkijena.jipipe.extensions.python

Class PythonPackageLibraryEnvironmentInstaller<T extends PythonPackageLibraryEnvironment>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.jipipe.api.environments.ExternalEnvironmentInstaller
      • org.hkijena.jipipe.extensions.python.PythonPackageLibraryEnvironmentInstaller<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, JIPipeRunnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JIPipePythonAdapterLibraryEnvironmentInstaller

    public abstract class PythonPackageLibraryEnvironmentInstaller<T extends PythonPackageLibraryEnvironment>
extends ExternalEnvironmentInstaller
    Installer for a PythonPackageLibraryEnvironment that will just delete any existing directories and re-install the library.
